name: Infiltration (itch) (PowerfulBacon, Supermafia00)
description:
An extremely short stealth shooter created by PowerfulBacon and SuperMafia00.

The goal of this game is to infiltrate an office and use the provided cheats to your full advantage, but watch out for backup, if you or a body is spotted the guards may bring in some backup.

Wallhack - Enemies will be visible through the walls. This is very cheap to use, and can give you a huge advantage especially when trying to sneak up on enemies while their backs are turned.

Invisibility - Expensive, but extremely powerful; invisibility lets you go completely invisible for the duration that it is active for. Enemies and turrets will not detect you, allowing you to walk into a room, take out the target and retreat, without anyone knowing you were there.

Turret Override - Turning the turrets rogue, this ability causes all turrets in a 15m radius to view the guards as hostiles. This also turns nearby turrets friendly, which is useful for crossing turret-watched areas.

The game's not great in all honesty, but it was made in only 6ish days; so there's that :)
